climbs.name: Phallograph
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon, Barry Chambers, Rhesa Ashbacher, Stephan, Tucker Tech, Blitzo

content.description: The Iron Sausage has 2 climbs on it; this is the right of the two. It starts out climbing a seam past some bolts, then to a slabbier section, and ending on a moderate (5.6/5.7) hand crack, and easier climbing to the top.
content.protection: Small to med stuff with QDs for the bolts. Brings slings for an anchor, which you may have to leave.
content.location: N. of the Wonderland Boy Scout Trail out of Indian Cove.

climbs.name: Knights of  the Iron Sausage
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon, Will Strickland, Beth Shilliday, Tucker Tech

content.description: There are 2 climbs on the Iron Sausage;  this is the left one, and the original , or first climb on the Iron Sausage.  It starts out with a sharp, jagged finger crack which leads to a FP and ends climbing up a blunt buttress past a bolt or two up then easier ground to the summit. Down climb (5th class) or leave some slings on the summit horns and rap.
content.protection: Small to med stuff, and a couple of quick draws.
content.location: North of the Boy Scout Trail out of Indian Cove.
